title: Spring Framework Has Three Major Pitfalls — Here’s What To Do
author: Jonathan Vila
description: Spring has some fantastic features that aid in the development process, but it’s vital to understand the framework's limitations and drawbacks.
cntitle: Spring 框架有三个主要陷阱——以下是如何应对
cndescription: Spring 有一些有助于开发过程的出色功能，但了解该框架的局限性和缺点至关重要。
